mapper.update: UPDATE goods SET goods_num = goods_num - #{num}, update_time = now() WHERE goods_id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT g.goods_name, g.goods_brand, g.goods_model, s.apply_num AS goodsNum, s.update_time, u.unit_name FROM goods g, studio st, stock_out_log s, unit u WHERE s.stud_id = st.stud_id AND s.goods_id = g.goods_id AND g.unit_id = u.unit_id AND s.agree = 0 AND s.stud_id = #{studId}

SELECT g.goods_id, g.goods_name, g.goods_brand, g.goods_model, g.goods_price, g.goods_num, g.ban, g.create_time, g.update_time, u.unit_name FROM goods g, unit u WHERE g.unit_id = u.unit_id AND g.logic_delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY g.update_time DESC
SELECT g.goods_name, g.goods_brand, g.goods_model, g.goods_price, g.goods_num, g.ban, u.unit_name FROM goods g, unit u WHERE g.unit_id = u.unit_id AND g.logic_delete_flag = 0

SELECT g.goods_name, SUM( s.apply_num ) AS num, u.unit_name FROM goods g, stock_out_log s, studio st, unit u WHERE s.goods_id = g.goods_id AND s.stud_id = st.stud_id AND g.unit_id = u.unit_id AND g.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND s.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND st.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND s.stud_id = #{studId} GROUP BY g.goods_name, u.unit_name
